questionTitle: Although she is very popular, she is not ............. her sister.
Ms. Jones isn't as nice.............. Ms. Smith.
The rooms in Graduate Towers are ................ Patterson Hall.
Tuition at an American university runs .......... six thousand dollars a semester.
The data on the winter migration patterns of the Monarch butterfly are very .................
In the ocean, ............ more salt in the deeper water.
The tendency to develop cancer, even in high-risk individuals, can be decreased ............. the amount of fruit and vegetables in the diet.
If endangered species ............ saved, rainforests must be protected .
Today's football match has been .............. because of bad weather. They will play next Thursday instead .
In England, the money you borrow to buy a house from a Building Society is called a ............
During the fight outside the football ground, an eighteen-year-old youth was accidentally killed . The person responsible was arrested and charged with ....................
If both parties in the strike cannot agree, then the Government are sometimes called into ...................
The very idea of my being a thief is quite ......................
Nothing can prevent me ................ going to China.
On the average, a healthy heart .............. to pump five tablespoons of blood with every beat.
More murders are reported .................. December in the United States than during any other month.
Adult eagles let their offspring ............... nests near their original nesting area.
